content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court case involved the division of assets of a deceased person including goods unpaid pension benefits funds in a bank account and a share of real estate there are two heirs both daughters of the deceased who are entitled to half of the assets according to the law the court ruled that the inheritance would be divided between the two heirs with one receiving half of the unpaid pension benefits half of the funds in the bank account and a 25 share of the real estate and the other receiving the same except for a 12 share of the real estate the court received the death certificate of the deceased and initiated inheritance proceedings the heirs agreed to an inheritance agreement and the court declared them as the legal heirs the value of the estate was determined and the heirs agreed to pay a court fee the text also explains the process of lodging an appeal in the case the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing enough copies of the appeal and stating the grounds for the appeal the appeal must be clear and if lodged by a proxy the proxy must be a qualified lawyer the court fee must be paid at the time of lodging the appeal

metadata.subject_of_succession: unpaid pension benefits, funds on personal bank account, real estate
